entries.journal_entry_description: Purvis Arrison seems to think he's at war with the Tuskens. He's asked you to recon their junk town, just outside of Mos Eisley.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Purvis wants you to recon a ravine near the Tusken Village.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Return to base, soldier. It's time to turn in all that information. I'll make sure you're well rewarded, too.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You should return to Purvis now that you've completed your recon.
